mapper.select: select a.contract_id contractId, a.division_id divisionId, a.theme theme, a.flow_no flow, a.status status, a.create_time createTime, b.name name, b.value userId, c.name deliveryLevel, c.value deliveryLeveryId, d.name deliveryType, d.value deliveryTypeId from t_business_delivery_application a left join ( select `name`, user_id value from sys_user WHERE status = '1' ) b on a.CREATE_USER_ID = b.value left join ( SELECT `value`, `name` FROM sys_dict WHERE type = 'color' ) c on a.DELIVERY_LEVEL = c.value left join ( SELECT `value`, `name` FROM sys_dict WHERE type = 'deliveryType' ) d on a.delivery_type = d.value WHERE id = #{id}
